## bollinger() function

Computes Bollinger bands using sliding window.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bollinger\_Bands](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bollinger_Bands)

Note: the number of results will be `period-1` less than the number of processed inputs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function bollinger(period?: number, sd?: number): Transducer<number, BollingerBand>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  period | <code>number</code> |  |
|  sd | <code>number</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<number, BollingerBand>`
